name: Pig Quest
description:
Made for the "Home of the Nerds Jam"

  • Team name: Bambi
  • Discord names: Taldius & Punkzen

Conrols:

  • Left click: Punch
  • Right click: Grab
  • WASD or arrows: Move

Credits:

  • Antoine Semblat: Game design, graphics and programming
  • Aurélien Montero: Music and sound design

Bug fix:

  • Hand could get stuck if an enemy died while performing a grab
  • Pig didn't get stunned after a punch or a grab
